title: Enhancing Service Quality Practical Competencies: Self-Regulated Learning and Metacognitive Strategies for Professional Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can achieve 80% or more of learning objectives within 8 weeks using metacognitive strategies (planning-monitoring-evaluation).
Learners independently apply self-regulated learning techniques at least three times while recording outcomes when solving language problems in complex job situations.
Learners revise and supplement learning strategies based on peer feedback within an LMS at least twice.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
